```{r}
# Load dataset
szn_stats <- read.csv("./Seasons_Stats.csv")
player_data <- read.csv("./player_data.csv")
szn_nums <- szn_stats
szn_nums$Tm <- NULL
szn_nums$Player <- NULL
szn_nums$Pos <- NULL
```


```{r}
# Extract era averages here

era1 <- szn_nums[which(szn_nums$Year <= 1965),]
era1 <- era1[!is.na(era1$PER), ]
era1 <- colMeans(era1)

era2 <- szn_nums[which(szn_nums$Year > 1965 & szn_nums$Year <= 1980),]
era2 <- colMeans(era2)

era3 <- szn_nums[which(szn_nums$Year > 1980 & szn_nums$Year <= 1990),]
era3 <- colMeans(era3)

era4 <- szn_nums[which(szn_nums$Year > 1990 & szn_nums$Year <= 2000),]
era4 <- colMeans(era4)

era5 <- szn_nums[which(szn_nums$Year > 2000 & szn_nums$Year <= 2010),]
era5 <- colMeans(era5)

era6 <- szn_nums[which(szn_nums$Year > 2010),]
era6 <- colMeans(era6)
```

```{r}
#separated the szn_stats into six subsetted datasets based on era.
#created per game stats for offensive and defensive rebounds, points, assists, blocks, and turnovers
#missing 67 observations since those rows have NA's in Year
szn_stats2 <- szn_stats
szn_stats2$PPG <- szn_stats2$PTS/szn_stats2$G
szn_stats2$ORPG <- szn_stats2$ORB/szn_stats2$G
szn_stats2$DRPG <- szn_stats2$DRB/szn_stats2$G
szn_stats2$APG <- szn_stats2$AST/szn_stats2$G
szn_stats2$BPG <- szn_stats2$BLK/szn_stats2$G
szn_stats2$TPG <- szn_stats2$TOV/szn_stats2$G

firstera <- subset(szn_stats2, Year <= 1965, )
secondera <- subset(szn_stats2, Year > 1965 & Year <= 1980)
thirdera <- subset(szn_stats2, Year > 1980 & Year <= 1990)
fourthera <- subset(szn_stats2, Year > 1990 & Year <= 2000)
fifthera <- subset(szn_stats2, Year > 2000 & Year <= 2010)
sixthera <- subset(szn_stats2, Year > 2010)

```
